meanings.definition: A flat-bottomed boat propelled by an aircraft-type propeller and used in shallow waters.
meanings.sent1: The airboat glided smoothly through the shallow swamp.
meanings.sent2: We took an airboat tour to explore the marshlands.
meanings.sent3: The airboat driver joked that he was the king of the swamp.
meanings.sent4: The airboat cut through the water like a knife through butter.
meanings.sent5: The loud roar of the airboat engine echoed across the wetlands.

meanings.definition: To travel in or operate an airboat.
meanings.sent1: We decided to airboat our way through the mangroves.
meanings.sent2: He loves to airboat on the weekends for fun.
meanings.sent3: She airboated to work when her car broke down.
meanings.sent4: I airboat through life, taking each day as it comes.
meanings.sent5: Airboating across the lake, he felt a sense of freedom and adventure.
